summary: Feature request to implement Rust dependency caching in CI using the rust-cache GitHub Action to improve build times by reducing redundant dependency compilation across builds.
userImpact: Reduces CI build times, enabling faster iteration and deployment cycles for SDK development.
proposedFix: Integrate Swatinem/rust-cache GitHub Action into CI workflow with working-directory option configured.
resolutionDetails: Implemented via PR #864 which integrated the rust-cache action, saving several minutes per build.
keyQuote: I just merged a PR (#864) that uses the action, save a few minutes. Wish we'd done this a while ago..
